values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_TESTYOURMETTLE_TASK
values.value: Conquer your adversaries in the neutral kingdom, demonstrate your strength, and seize the well-deserved spoils.

values.name: SYSTEM_MESSAGE_TITLE_TESTYOURMETTLE_STAGE_1_BODY
values.value:
The event has started and the Seats of Power are Unlocked for the next two hours on the neutral kingdom.

Please note the following changes to the event:
1) Cross-kingdom titles are now disabled.
2) Progressive rewards added for killing and wounding troops.
3) Seats in the neutral kingdom are unlocked immediately (no 3-hour wait).
4) Better healing buffs on the neutral kingdom.

values.name: DRIVEN_DRAGONFEEDXPBONUS_ALPHA_DESCRIPTION
values.value: Bonus to XP from Feeding your dragon
